Name: Golden Troupe
Title: Surpassing the Ancient Dream: Golden Troupe
Desc: "Abide until that day... Abide until that day...\nWhen every member of the Golden Troupe shall win the whole future as their prize."

Talent.Name: Golden Troupe
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> If the character to which this is attached is on standby, this card gains 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>"Recompense"</color> point. (Max 4 points)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card or a Character uses an Elemental Skill:</color> For each <color=#FFFFFFFF>"Recompense"</color> point this card has, consume it to spend 1 less Elemental Die.\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
